name: Thief's Curse
description:
Our lowly thief has made the score of a lifetime but it may be his last. Return the cursed amulet before you expire. Avoid the traps and enemies in your quest to rid yourself of this wretched curse. 

Best experienced in full-screen. 

Music:

Theme Music: https://opengameart.org/content/spooky-dungeon

Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio

End Music: https://opengameart.org/content/har%C3%A1n

www.megupets.com

Sounds made with Bfxr
